text:
Evaluate trig functions without using a calculator using cofunction identities

\begin{array}{l}\n\tan 60^{\circ}= \\\n\sin 30^{\circ}= \\\n\cos 30^{\circ}= \\\n\cot 60^{\circ}=\n\end{array}[imath]\tan 60^{\circ}= [/imath] [imath]\sin 30^{\circ}= [/imath] [imath]\cos 30^{\circ}= [/imath] [imath]\cot 60^{\circ}=[/imath]
